Prerequisites expert in Performance

Your performances are especially distracting, allowing your allies to sneak away with ease.

When you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} an ally who is trying to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion}, instead of the usual effects of Aid, you can roll a Performance check and use that result to determine the outcome of the diversion, instead of the ally rolling a Deception check.
